Default Test Application Data Structure
=======================================
Layout
------
    <cms:field:default_field:text>
    layout_content_a
    <cms:page:default_page:text>
    layout_content_b
    <cms:snippet:default_snippet>
    layout_content_c
Page
----
### CmsBlock::FieldText
    default_field_content
### CmsBlock::PageText
    default_page_content_a
    <cms:snippet:default_snippet>
    default_page_content_a
Snippets
-------
### Snippet
    default_snippet_content
